images.description: SDSS image of region near elliptical galaxy NGC 1199 overlaid on a DSS background to fill in missing areas; also shown are NGC 1189, NGC 1190, NGC 1191, and NGC 1192. Together, the five galaxies comprise Hickson Compact Group 22.
SDSS image of elliptical galaxy NGC 1199 slightly overlaid on a DSS background to fill in minor missing areas
